text: Quillan is a commune of 3,258 people (2017). It is in the region Occitanie in the Aude department in the south of France. On 1 January 2016, the former commune of Brenac became a part of the commune of Quillan.Arrêté préfectoral 21 December 2015 == References == Category:Communes in Aude
title: Quillan
